ThingDef.label: Fire pit
ThingDef.description: A bonfire with a cauldron. Allows you to heat water and create different drinks.

ThingDef.label: Efficiency module
ThingDef.description: Large induction coil built into the metal housing. Allows higher temperatures to be reached faster, opening up access to melting things like plasteel

ThingDef.label: Biome ores module
ThingDef.description: Module for the advanced smelter that allows to refine biome ores, such as mithril, chlorophyte and ceramite. Essential, if you want to use them.

ThingDef.label: Mechanical processing module
ThingDef.description: A bulky machine for crushing and washing ore. It allows you to get 40% more useful substances out of the pile of ore you put in it. Uses a lot of water.

ThingDef.label: Chemical processing module
ThingDef.description: The chemical processing module allows you to utilize the ore even more effectively, achieving 200% efficiency from the original value.

ThingDef.label: Preservation module
ThingDef.description: Preservation Table - a modular machine for making canned foods from fresh products, connected to an electric stove. It has compartments for jars, a timer, a thermometer and pressure gauges. It opens up new recipes for canned foods.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Smelter
ThingDef.description: Advanced melting furnace, allows you to obtain extreme temperatures for remelting ores. Its main disadvantage is the lack of temperature control and huge electricity costs

ThingDef.label: Stone Smelter
ThingDef.description: Big stone furnace that can be used for make an alloys

ThingDef.label: Fermentation Jug
ThingDef.description: Jug for fermentation, you can produce a variety of drinks

ThingDef.label: Grind stone
ThingDef.description: A table with a stone for grinding all sorts of things

ThingDef.label: Loom
ThingDef.description: Big loom for making textiles

ThingDef.label: Drying Rack
ThingDef.description: Meat dryer. Allows you to dry meat, thus allowing you to store it longer

ThingDef.label: Writing Desk
ThingDef.description: A desk for writing papers. It is used for writing theories and books.

ThingDef.label: tribal bench
ThingDef.description: Log with some hay on it, should be helpful when you trying to make a spear.

ThingDef.label: Advanced hydroponics (1x1)
ThingDef.description: Grows plants quickly in an artificial, sealed ecosystem which can be configured to effectively grow even picky plants. Requires a high amount of power to work; plants will die if power is cut. Contains a built-in sun lamp to provide light for the plants.\n\nThis version is modular and can be assembled in any shape necessary.

ThingDef.label: Serum Coder
ThingDef.description: Meat dryer. Allows you to dry meat, thus allowing you to store it longer

ThingDef.label: Medical workbench
ThingDef.description: A workbench equipped with molecular printing technology to produce bionic protheses.

ThingDef.label: Fish trap
ThingDef.description: A little food is placed in the fish trap as bait, once the fish swims inside, it can no longer swim out and you can safely get it out.

ThingDef.label: Pierce
ThingDef.description: A fishing pier

ThingDef.label: Mine
ThingDef.description: Gravel and sand mine

ThingDef.label: Microbial lab
ThingDef.description: Microbe Lab - Allows you to create various preparations

ThingDef.label: Crusher
ThingDef.description: The crusher is capable of crushing stones into sand or crushed stone

ThingDef.label: Electric loom
ThingDef.description: Electric weaving machine with automatic raw material processing. All you have to do is load the raw material, select the type of processing and wait. In a few hours, perfect fabric rolls will be waiting for you.
